Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not your turn to go there yet, Changli. You are a very gifted child, and you will surely achieve greatness one day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the price you pay for forcefully employing your Forte can never be erased. Your lifespan is doomed to be much shorter than that of ordinary people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Changli's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Yes, I understand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember what I have taught you. Ponder carefully, plan meticulously, and shield yourself wisely. For when you have grown into the person you aspire to become... Your impact on this world shall be great.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Changli's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli will remember your teachings by heart, master.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Changli's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But master... This person you want me to find... How should I find them?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When the time comes, you will know, and you will have my aid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You need only use your wisdom to offer that person some necessary guidance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She} is the only one who can truly change this world. You must find {Male=him;Female=her} and help {Male=him;Female=her}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli recalls her master Xuanmiao's farewell before he passed away, during which he imparted wisdom on navigating life and instructed her to assist someone capable of truly changing the world. Seeing this memory, Changli now understands what must be done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanmiao's Mirage
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This way, the world of prosperity you seek will soon be within reach.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I believe... I've found that person, master.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (...This Weiqi board, and the Sonoro Sphere... They are both a puzzle and an answer.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The end of this Sonoro Sphere... Turns out it's exactly where {Male=he;Female=she} is.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess this is another riddle from my master...

Chapters.Title: Connect the light beams of the mechanism
Proceed to the end of the Sonoro Sphere

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I'm fine...

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think I'm remembering something... but it's all just a blur, I can't make out any clear images...

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been looking for something... for a long, long time...

Options.PlotLineKey: What are you looking for?

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know... I just remember that it's very, very important, something that can change the world...

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I'm starting to wonder why I'm even here... Everything looks so different from what I remember...

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And... Why do you look so familiar? We've never met before...

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe we've met in the future.
(Is this an effect of the Temporal Disruption, too?...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm?

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this... a missing part of the device?

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We might be able to open that door with it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What will we find behind that door?

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe it's what you're looking for.
Maybe it's the exit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah... I hope so.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After solving the puzzle, Changli spots you and the girl's mirage from afar. Meanwhile, the girl recalls that she has been searching for something important. She feels an odd familiarity with you, despite never having met before. Suddenly, a missing part of the device needed to open the gate appears in her hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Master's Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A scheme be grander than naught. Vanquish malevolence in its nascent guise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Master's Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli, you have done well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Master's Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that you have found the answers you seek... it is time to begin your journey.

Dialogues.Speaker: Master's Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From this moment on, the choices you make and the plans you lay out...

Dialogues.Speaker: Master's Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They will all lead to that future.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Changli.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry. I kept you waiting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fractsidus Artificer A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place... It—

Dialogues.Speaker: Fractsidus Artificer B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Run!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fractsidus Artificer C
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-It's a trap! They played us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This game is almost over.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you feel it? It's warm... Doesn't hurt at all, see?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's so beautiful...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wuli, this is the miracle we've been waiting to see! It's hope reborn after destruction...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fuling...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's over.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you find what you were looking for?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your help. The Midnight Rangers have successfully apprehended all remaining Fractsidus members in the mountains, and the effects of the Temporal Disruption have now vanished.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I lost all contact with you during this whole time. Did you run into any trouble?

Options.PlotLineKey: (Tell Xinyi what happened.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Temporal Disruption hidden inside a Sonoro Sphere... It makes sense now why it stayed hidden for so long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never thought the solution would be to burn down the entire Sonoro Sphere from the inside...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You went too far back there, Changli.

Options.PlotLineKey: Changli, about your condition...
Yeah, that was a bit too risky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know my limits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, Lady Changli...

Options.PlotLineKey: How are you feeling?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wuli is fine now, thanks to his doctor's help. As for me... Well, at least I can still walk a bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, it's been almost five days...

Options.PlotLineKey: So it's already been five days...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never properly thanked you for bringing me back to Hongzhen. I heard about the attack by the Fractsidus in the mountains. I... I'm so sorry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *chuckle* No need for that. I understand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fractsidus had their eyes on the same thing as we did. They've been planning an ambush on us for a long time. Why would we blame it on you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We will never forget how you saved us. You gave us the opportunity to witness such a breathtaking sight. Thanks to your help, this journey holds no regrets for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for the truth behind the so-called Secret of Immortality... Fuling has told me everything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I had a gut feeling it would turn out to be a disappointment, but I couldn't give up. And in the end, I lost sight of why I even started this journey...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...But this isn't the first time this has happened. Let's just call it another adventure coming to an end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've talked about it with Fuling. From now on, I'll take her on more trips to see more new places together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until the day... when I can no longer hold a pen. I've already talked to the folks at the publishing house, and they're happy to let me continue painting for them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My eventual departure may be unavoidable, but I want to give it my all until the very end.

Options.PlotLineKey: No matter what happens, please take care.
Even if...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know you have already looked past death, but remember... There are people who care about you. They want you to live on and be happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, I understand. Sometimes, I wish...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...we could stay together a little longer, if only for a while...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, Fuling, I... We've always been...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not time to be sad yet, is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've compiled a list of renowned doctors in Huanglong. They're highly skilled and may offer assistance for your medical condition, which is challenging but not impossible to cure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lady Changli, I truly can't thank you enough...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need for thanks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... If you're feeling generous and want to repay me, I hope to see Fuling's work in the next issue of "Artists of Huanglong".

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone's been missing seeing their favorite landscape artist's work lately.

Options.PlotLineKey: Didn't know you were a magazine reader.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you surprised? Well, now I'm curious. What kind of a person do you see me as?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that the situation has been resolved, you should return to Hongzhen. You deserve some good rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After going through so much, you must be exhausted, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: What about you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? Well, I think Lady Xinyi could use the extra help with dealing with the aftermath.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you sure you'll be okay?
Got it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, It wouldn't hurt to have a little more faith in me, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Splendid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's getting late. Maybe we should wait until we get back to discuss anything else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You and Changli manage to escape the burning Sonoro and reunite with Xinyi, Wuli, and Fuling. The remaining members of the Fractsidus have been captured by the Midnight Rangers, and the Temporal Disruptions have ceased. Wuli and Fuling understand each other's true feelings and plan to explore more places together, continuing their pursuit of shared dreams. Changli asks you to rest while she assists Xinyi in wrapping up loose ends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Two days have passed since Changli told me that she and Xinyi would handle the aftermath. I wonder how she's doing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you worried? Let's just go ask her then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Might as well. Changli can be difficult to find. Let's go ask Xinyi first.

Chapters.Title: Learn about Changli's whereabouts with Xinyi

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, greetings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're almost done dealing with the aftermath of the previous incident. We're currently questioning the remaining Fractsidus members we caught at Mt. Firmament.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They wanted to get their hands on the Temporal Program from the legend of the Weiqi game, with the intention of unleashing chaos in Mt. Firmament once again. But thanks to you and Changli, their plans were foiled.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli recounted to us that a Fractsidus Overseer had entered the Sonoro Sphere and was injured by her fire. They were lucky to escape, but have not been seen since.

Options.PlotLineKey: They just don't know when to quit...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've put together a thorough report for City Hall. We will strengthen our defenses to make sure this doesn't happen again.

Options.PlotLineKey: What about Changli?
I haven't seen her these days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We parted two days ago on the coast, and then she returned to Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps she's just taking some time to rest and recover... It must have taken a lot out of her to summon that much fire at once.

Options.PlotLineKey: How is she doing?
...She's being too hard on herself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli knew you’d be worried, and she wanted me to relay this message to you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meet her at the pavilion on Mt. Firmament. She'll be waiting for you there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xinyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She also said... No more riddles this time.

Options.PlotLineKey: Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Two days later, you visit Xinyi in the Meeting Room, learning that the Fractsidus was indeed seeking the Temporal Mandate referenced in the Weiqi game legend. However, their scheme was thwarted by you and Changli. The Fractsidus Overseer who had entered the Sonoro has vanished. As for Changli, she awaits you at the pavilion.

Chapters.Title: Meet with Changli at the agreed location

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How are you feeling, {PlayerName}? Well-rested, I hope.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm feeling great, but...
I'm more concerned about you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aww. Can't you see I'm perfectly fine, sitting right in front of you?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm still a little worried.
Is Mt. Firmament back to normal?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, {PlayerName}. We are only having a casual conversation today. Nothing taxing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, you only agreed to join me here for more questions, right?

Options.PlotLineKey: That's not my only reason...
Indeed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, is that so? I'm curious then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure, ask away. I'm happy to answer them to the best of my ability.

Options.PlotLineKey: About the game record and "Secret of Immortality"...
About the Sonoro Sphere...
About the little girl in that Sonoro Sphere...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It all started a century ago, when my mentor, Master Xuanmiao, had a brief encounter with a certain peculiar visitor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During a TD Outbreak, my master was rescued by that individual. {Male=He;Female=She} exuded a unique energy and was always elusive. My master dug through ancient texts and unearthed {Male=his;Female=her} presence in long-forgotten history.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After searching for several years, he finally met that person on Mt. Firmament again. They played a game of Weiqi together, and that was how the legendary game record came into being.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At first, I thought my master meant the game record held actual information about the time crisis. But it was just a clue. The real key was finding you, the person behind it all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And lastly, the Secret of Immortality... It's most likely just the woodcutter's own spin on the tale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My master and the mysterious "visitor" had set a trap with the Sonoro Sphere, using the Weiqi game as a guise. They hid it with the Court of Savantae's Chronosorters, and it would only activate once the time flow on Mt. Firmament was restored to its normal state.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite the Sentinel and Mt. Firmament being saved, the Fractsidus would not go down without a fight. They were convinced that the Temporal Mandate was hidden within the game of Weiqi, but little did they know, they had already fallen into a trap.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pure coincidence or the calculated workings of the Fractsidus, the explorer stumbled upon the Weiqi board, setting off its defense mechanisms.

Options.PlotLineKey: I see...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sentinel was already damaged when it arrived here. My master had foreseen the disasters that would befall Mt. Firmament, so he created this mechanism as a precautionary measure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sonoro Sphere would devour all who attempted to enter, unless they knew the solution to that puzzle.

Options.PlotLineKey: The solution? You mean burning down everything?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Precisely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The only way to escape was by burning the Sonoro Sphere without hurting anyone inside. It required masterful control of Forte. Thinking back, it was probably his ultimate test for me.

Options.PlotLineKey: It also thwarted the Fractsidus's plans.
Didn't know someone could plan so much ahead...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was his first goal with this Sonoro Sphere.

Options.PlotLineKey: There is a second one?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before leaving, Master entrusted me with a mission: To find that individual... The one who played Weiqi with him. The one who left behind that game record.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After my master's passing, {Male=he;Female=she} would be the only one who could control the Sonoro Sphere. By now, you should know who {Male=he;Female=she} is.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is it me?
I think it's me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes.

Options.PlotLineKey: But I don't even remember that Sonoro Sphere.
I see that's why you seemed to know a lot about me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why you needed me as your Wayfinder.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My master often mentioned you before his passing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And from the moment you arrived in Jinzhou, I had my suspicions about your true identity. Our journey to Mt. Firmament solidified my beliefs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And finally, the Weiqi board in that Sonoro Sphere sealed the truth for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed... Those memories... They were all real.

Options.PlotLineKey: I saw... a little girl in the Sonoro Sphere.
I assume that was a younger version of you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... That's all in the past, just a little homeless girl with no name.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never thought we could make new memories in the Sonoro Sphere, where only the past repeats itself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A moment of companionship and protection meant everything to me.

Options.PlotLineKey: But I wasn't really there for you. Not in the real past.
If there isn't a Secret to Immortality, what about you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can sense your unspoken question. Did I sacrifice my life when I burned down the Sonoro Sphere, like when I was a child?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What I told you there was true. But I've grown and gained control over my powers. Using my Forte now won't harm me in any way. Of that you can rest assured.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also... If you really are the legendary person who changed the course of history, then you are perhaps the closest to immortality aside from our Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We mortals come and go, our lives are full of meetings and goodbyes. Our time on this earth is fleeting compared to yours. So don't let it bother you.

Options.PlotLineKey: I live in the moment, just like you do.
...That is not the same.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. Perhaps this is why... It's so hard to leave this beautiful world behind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then... Would you be willing to finish that game of Weiqi with me instead?

Options.PlotLineKey: Of course.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you meet Changli at the pavilion, she reveals everything. You were the "golden-eyed visitor" who played Weiqi with Master Xuanmiao. Back then, you foresaw a disaster striking Mt. Firmament and left the Sonoro as a contingency plan. Changli admits that while she is not concerned about her lifespan, she feels a deep sadness at the thought of leaving behind the world's beauty. Now, she wishes to play that long-anticipated game of Weiqi with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The young orphan girl carried on

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everywhere she looked, tragedies rampant

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As Lament engulfed the globe

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A world torn by monsters, filled with homeless souls

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With her own blood as fire, she drove away the cold

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And her master said...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this tumultuous world, lives are fragile as mayflies

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She couldn't exhaust herself to save those before her

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she must endure

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To ignite a brighter tomorrow

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She wielded her wits to evade harm, treading on knives with care

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alone, yet maturing through stumbles

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Later on, she became someone else's "teacher"

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She taught the future leader this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To guide conscience, and secure prosperity for the people

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To continue lost teachings of past sages, and establish peace for all

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "I will be the torchbearer, for one person can't rid the world of chaos alone."

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —One day, a future of prosperity and lasting peace will arrive
